articles.title: Vijay rally crush: More than 30 killed at political event in Tamil Nadu - BBC
articles.description: Tens of thousands had gathered at a campaign event for actor-turned-politician Vijay in India's southern state of Tamil Nadu.
articles.content:
At least 36 people have died, including children, in a crush at a political rally in the southern Indian state of Tamil Nadu, state officials say.
Tens of thousands of people had gathered on Saturda… [+1714 chars]
